text: The Hebrew Wikipedia () is the Hebrew-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition was started in July 2003. By February 2012, it had over 130,000 articles, over 534,000 pages and 33,500 files uploaded.:he:מיוחד:סטטיסטיקות As of October 2015, it is the 39th largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles.Wikimedia list of Wikipedias and their statistics.. Retrieved 25 October 2015. ==Related pages== * Yiddish * Judaism * History of Jews * Jewish diaspora ==Other websites== * Hebrew Wikipedia main page Category:Wikipedias Category:Websites established in 2003 ==References==
title: Hebrew Wikipedia
